items.title: Illegal Alien Who Ran Des Moines School District Had Long History Of Criminal Charges
items.description: In the throes of the DEI era the color of Roberts' skin was more compelling than this loaded weapons conviction.

items.title: Why Calling Charlie Kirk A Martyr Matters
items.description: Charlie Kirk’s murder was not simply the death of a man, but a spiritual assault in a spiritual war between Good and Evil.

items.title: California’s Vague ‘Hate Speech’ Bill Would Force Big Tech To Censor Mainstream Conservative Views
items.description: SB-771 threatens to turn digital platforms into ideological enforcers, punishing those who hold traditional, faith-based viewpoints.

items.title: Biden Judge Gives Would-Be Kavanaugh Assassin Light Sentence As Left-Wing Violence Skyrockets
items.description: Prosecutors wanted Boardman to sentence Roske to 'no fewer than 30 years to life imprisonment' for his plot against Kavanaugh.

items.title: DOJ Opens Investigation Into Antifa-Indulging Portland Police
items.description: The probe follows the arrest of a conservative journalist who says he was taken into custody after being attacked by Antifa thugs.
